title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 369-4.2 - Eligible projects
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 369-4.2 - Eligible projects

State Regulations

Eligible projects can include reasonable municipal costs, as determined by the department, related to operating household hazardous waste
collection programs or operating a household hazardous waste collection and
storage facility or mobile collection facility, and associated educational and
promotional expenses. It is not necessary that all types of household hazardous
waste be collected for the collection program to be eligible. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
§§
369-4.2

New

York State Register September 20, 2017/Volume XXXIX, Issue 38, eff. 11/4/2017

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
